definition: abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)

sentences.english: It is difficult to achieve the precision measurement of the position of the micro holes with traditional methods.
sentences.chinese: 微小孔系的精密測量用傳統的手段是難以實現的。

sentences.english: 'It goes without saying such a target would be difficult to reach, ' Mr. Ito said Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 伊東孝紳週二說，不用說，這一目標將難以實現。

sentences.english: Last but not least, it is impractical to modernize and globalize the theory of artistic conception.
sentences.chinese: 意境理認的“現代化”與“世界化”難以實現。

sentences.english: It is very difficult to realize the deep hole drilling process because of its specialty.
sentences.chinese: 深孔鑽削加工由於其特殊性，是比較難以實現的。

sentences.english: The simple via connection has been difficult to achieve high-quality signal transmission.
sentences.chinese: 因此簡單的過孔連接已經難以實現高質量的信號傳輸。

sentences.english: Yet profound exploration of human physiology remained elusive.
sentences.chinese: 然而對人體生理學的深入探索仍難以實現。

sentences.english: However, the processes that promote lung tissue repair have remained elusive.
sentences.chinese: 然而，促進肺組織修復的進程仍然難以實現。

sentences.english: 'It goes without saying such a target would be difficult to reach, ' Mr.
sentences.chinese: 伊東孝紳週二說，不用說，這一目標將難以實現。

sentences.english: Without the rule of law, there will not be long-term order and security.
sentences.chinese: 不實行法制，社會難以實現長治久安。

sentences.english: A number of countries -- including Japan -- are struggling to meet that target.
sentences.chinese: 包括日本在內的許多國家都難以實現這一目標。

sentences.english: But it is also hardly to realize for us ordinary people.
sentences.chinese: 然而這對於我這種平頭百姓，也是難以實現的夢想。

sentences.english: We could not have reached our scalability goals without it.
sentences.chinese: 如果沒有它，我們就難以實現可伸縮性目標。

sentences.english: A major reason for this is the difficult to accurately measure the material level.
sentences.chinese: 一個主要原因是其料位精確測量難以實現。
